Firewall Disabled.Remediation: Enable Windows Defender Firewall for all profiles and manage it centrally via Group Policy.

RDP Enabled.Remediation: Disable RDP if not required. If required, restrict access, enforce NLA, and limit firewall scope.

RDP NLA Not Required.Remediation: Require Network Level Authentication (NLA) for all RDP connections.

SMBv1 Enabled.Remediation: Disable SMBv1 on all systems. SMBv1 is deprecated and vulnerable to lateral movement attacks.

SMB Signing Not Required (Server).Remediation: Require SMB signing on servers via Group Policy.

SMB Signing Not Required (Client).Remediation: Require SMB signing on clients via Group Policy.

Defender Real-time Protection Disabled.Remediation: Enable real-time protection and ensure Defender is managed and enforced by policy.

Defender Antivirus Disabled.Remediation: Ensure an approved antivirus solution is enabled and healthy.
